page.title: 04BLACKALDERN ESTATE
page.content: BLACKALDERN IS A BEAUTIFUL MANSION. IT WAS FIRST BUILT IN 1770 BUT THE FRONT PART WAS BUILT 200 YEARS LATER.THE PERSON WHO OWNS IT IS MRS DE QUINCY SHE HAS LIVED THERE FOR 20 YEARS.SHE HAS 175 ACRES OF LAND.THE SIZE OF HER LITTLE GARDEN IS 2 ACRES ALTOGETHER .MOST OF THE FARM LAND IS PASTURE.THE RHODODENDRONS COME FROM JAPAN,KOREA AND CHINA.IT IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC ON 2 DAYS A YEAR AND THEY OPEN A LITTLE MARKET.IT WOULD BE AN IDEAL PLACE FOR TOURISTS TO GO AND THE SIGHT OF THE GARDENS WOULD ENCHANT VISITORS. THE GARDENS HAVE LOTS OF FLOWERS BUT THEY ARE MOSTLY AZEALEAS AND RHODODENDRONS.I THINK IT IS A MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACE.
